note.p: Death: His house in Dumfries (21 December 1823)
Career: Leib-medic to Empress Catherine II and her successors
References: E M Tansey, 'The Life and Works of Sir Alexander Crichton, FRS (1763-1856): A Scottish Physician to the Imperial Russian Court' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 241-259
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
